languages.text: {n}Из ступора вас вырывает резкое гарканье Равора. Глаза Главного кормчего пусты, бледные губы скривились в ярости.{/n} "Ни шагу дальше, пустотный отброс! За покушение на безопасность Лорд-капитана я приговариваю тебя к казни!"

{n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"
languages.original_text: {n}Из ступора вас вырывает резкое гарканье Равора. Глаза Главного кормчего пусты, бледные губы скривились в ярости.{/n} "Ни шагу дальше, пустотный отброс! За покушение на безопасность Лорд-капитана я приговариваю тебя к казни!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, void scum! I sentence you to death for violating the Lord Captain's safety!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}La brusca voz de Ravor te saca de tu estupor. Los ojos del maestro timonel están vacíos y sus labios pálidos forman una mueca furiosa.{/n} «¡Ni un paso más, chusma del vacío! ¡Quedas condenad{mf|o|a} a muerte por poner en peligro a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La brusca voz de Ravor te saca de tu estupor. Los ojos del maestro timonel están vacíos y sus labios pálidos forman una mueca furiosa.{/n} «¡Ni un paso más, chusma del vacío! ¡Quedas condenad{mf|o|a} a muerte por poner en peligro a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán!».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアの激しい叫び声で、ぼんやりした思考からハッと我に返る。マスター・ヘルムスマンの目は虚ろで、青白い唇は怒りに満ちている。{/n}「一歩も近づくな、ヴォイドのゴミめ！ロード・キャプテンの安全を脅かした罪で、死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアの激しい叫び声で、ぼんやりした思考からハッと我に返る。マスター・ヘルムスマンの目は虚ろで、青白い唇は怒りに満ちている。{/n}「一歩も近づくな、ヴォイドのゴミめ！ロード・キャプテンの安全を脅かした罪で、死刑を宣告する！」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}雷沃发出了刺耳的咆哮声，让你从恍惚中清醒过来。舵手长的眼神无比空洞，苍白的嘴唇愤怒地扭曲着。{/n}“不准再往前走了，渣滓！我在此判处你死刑，因为你危及到了舰长大人的安全！”
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃发出了刺耳的咆哮声，让你从恍惚中清醒过来。舵手长的眼神无比空洞，苍白的嘴唇愤怒地扭曲着。{/n}“不准再往前走了，渣滓！我在此判处你死刑，因为你危及到了舰长大人的安全！”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravors harsches Bellen reißt dich aus deiner Benommenheit. Der Blick des Hauptsteuermanns ist leer, seine fahlen Lippen krümmen sich vor Zorn.{/n} "Keinen Schritt weiter, Leerenabschaum! Ich verurteile Euch wegen Gefährdung der Sicherheit des Lord Captains zum Tode!"
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravors harsches Bellen reißt dich aus deiner Benommenheit. Der Blick des Hauptsteuermanns ist leer, seine fahlen Lippen krümmen sich vor Zorn.{/n} "Keinen Schritt weiter, Leerenabschaum! Ich verurteile Euch wegen Gefährdung der Sicherheit des Lord Captains zum Tode!"
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Un puissant rugissement de Ravor vous tire de votre stupeur. Le regard du maître timonier est vide alors qu'il tord les lèvres dans ce qui semble être un accès de fureur.{/n} « Pas un pas de plus, vermine ! Je vous condamne à mort pour avoir menacé la sécurité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un puissant rugissement de Ravor vous tire de votre stupeur. Le regard du maître timonier est vide alors qu'il tord les lèvres dans ce qui semble être un accès de fureur.{/n} « Pas un pas de plus, vermine ! Je vous condamne à mort pour avoir menacé la sécurité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ! »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un şiddetli feryadıyla sersemlik hâlinden kurtuluyorsun. Başserdümen'in gözleri boş, solgun dudakları da öfkeyle kıvrılıyor.{/n} "Bir adım daha yaklaşma uçsuz pisliği! Lord Kaptan'ın güvenliğini tehlikeye atmaktan seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}You are snapped out of your stupor by Ravor's harsh bellow. The Master Helmsman's eyes are empty, his pale lips curling in fury.{/n} "Not one step further, voidscum! I sentence you to death for endangering the Lord Captain's safety!"
